name: just breathe...
description:
Entry for the Bideo Jam 2019

a game about living with anxiety, inspired by Matt Makes Games' Celeste. complete a perilous journey, balancing your fears, resolve, trust, and anxiety to survive the trip and help your friends along too.

a game for a gm and 2-4 players. uses 2d6 die.

this is in playtest! the game is free for the duration of the jam, and a plain text version will remain free, forever.
